scripts.setup: bundle exec middleman build --clean && git add . && git commit -m 'update docs' && git push && pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js production setup
scripts.deploy-start: pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js production run NODE_ENV=production pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.deploy_clean: bundle exec middleman build --clean && pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js production --force
scripts.deploy: bundle exec middleman build --clean && git add . && git commit -m 'update docs' && git push && pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js production --force
